website_summaries.verdict: A stripped down version of the classic Tamagotchi in a teeny-tin package.
pros: Available in a variety of colors
One of the cheapest Tamagotchi versions out there
Has a handy chain for hanging toy on a backpack
cons: Limited number of features and small screen

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people have been complaining about the 20th anniversary mini Tamagotchis, but honestly, I love them. This is my first one, and I immediately ordered another after playing with it. As an adult, taking care of a full Tamagotchi is a bit much. This one is definitely more my speed these days. Functionality includes: feeding (meal & snack), cleaning, taking care of it when it's sick, and turning on & off its light when it goes to sleep. You can also toggle the sound as well. I think it's a really fun remake of the original, and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Tsuji

customer_reviews.title: Not the original tamagotchi at all
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. It wasn't obvious to me that I was buying a mini, simplified remake of the original tamagotchi. I saw "The Original Virtual Pet" and got excited. This isn't the original. All you can do is feed it, nothing else. And the toy is so freaking small you can hardly handle it. And forget being able to see the screen. It can't be that hard to re release the original so why not do that?
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Rick

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do anything, doesn't need anything
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 yr old because I always wanted one as a kid. This mini version is totally pointless. She fed it once or twice and has looked at it over and over for the last three hours. She finally said, "I wish I could do something. This is boring." You can't play with it, which I thought was one of the best parts of the original. If it doesn't want to eat, there's nothing to do unless it poops or gets sick. It won't even do that. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen M.

customer_reviews.title: SUPER tiny. Took 7 weeks to arrive.
customer_reviews.text: These took 7 weeks to arrive and by the time they did I had already purchased the gifts I needed for Christmas. On top of them arriving so late they were SUPER SUPER tiny. We never turned them on but the screen was so super tiny- I cannot imagine seeing much on them. We ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: MommyC

customer_reviews.title: Nothing wrong with the seller
customer_reviews.text: The seller: On time and properly packaged. Came brand new and with battery. No issues there but... The product: I should have read about the product beforehand. I jumped from a tamagotchi V1 connection (which I presumed 'dead' ) to this... and it was highly disappointing. There's almost no features and the care menu is gone. You can basically only feed it and pick up its poop. There are no games. It is basically a pretty watch that you occasionally have to feed and look after. Do not get. Ps: I just took the battery out of it and just revived my old V1 connection and that made this buy someone worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Luxenkiyo

customer_reviews.title: Small, cute, and simple
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It’s a much simpler version of the connection versions, but I really appreciate the small, cute size as well as the ease of taking care of it. I personally still play with the v4.5 every so often, but this is a great alternative for those looking for play with a Tamagotchi once again.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to be like my old Tamagotchi but it’s just so small. Even the interface is slightly different than the original, having been shrunk to fit the new size.
customer_reviews.author: E.M.

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia is a fickle beast
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she was hyped for a good week or two. I honestly have no idea where this is at home right now and neither does she. Gets boring fast, and the small size is actually more annoying than helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Papadoc

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Super fun to relive childhood. Screen is small, and no games to play. But ok for small kids
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great little novelty toy
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and packaged very well. It is very small and compact, it fits great on a keychain and the buttons are very durable. However, glass screen scratched within a day or two which made it harder to see in different lighting. The tamagotchi is not very bright and the beeps it makes are quiet. The owner has very few options as to how to care for the tomagotchi making the whole thing somewhat of a gimmick and very bleak.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Garza

customer_reviews.title: I got two of these for my daughter and her ...
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for my daughter and her friend. They are much smaller than the original ones and hard to play .
customer_reviews.author: Geek Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for kids to see what back in the day toys were like fun and teaches responsibility
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my kid got bored with it
customer_reviews.text: my kid got bored with it. It doesn't do anything like the one I had when I was younger. So now we bought a tamagotchi friend and I think that one will be better. It's the same size as the original.
customer_reviews.author: calena

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than we thought
customer_reviews.text: They’re smaller than we thought, but our girls (5 and 9) love playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Vee

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Kids love bringing it around with them and taking care of it when it makes a sound.
customer_reviews.author: BJHart85

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic but not as interactive.
customer_reviews.text: This is fun if you are my age and want to relive a little piece of your childhood. Brings back good memories. Made well. It's definitely significantly smaller than the originals, which doesnt bother me much. What I do feel like I am missing out on are the fun features of the original. For those who remember, there were was to play with and discipline your Tamagotchi. I just feel like this added to the interest of owning one. This newer version is seriously missing out on that factor by not having the capability to do such. If they remade it again with the capability of play and discipline I would definitely buy it again to give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller than it should be. It’s not doing us a service making it so small. What is this? A tamagotchi for ants?
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jones

customer_reviews.title: not like the original
customer_reviews.text: not like the original, just feed and clear, no game to play with. my kid stop playing with it after a few day, waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for children.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a niece for her birthday this year. She loves it. She likes to watch it grow and enjoys being able to raise it, play with it and cleaning it.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for kids
customer_reviews.text: I loved these when I was kid. Bought one for my daughter for her birthday she loves it

customer_reviews.title: she was super excited to test it out

She pulled the tab and nothing happened. We also hit the restart button and the screen is still blank. It would be greatly appreciated if someone can contact me to sort this out

customer_reviews.title: ... my daughter wanted and she was thrilled so still happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: its small and I found it cheaper at Walmart after I had purchased it but its what my daughter wanted and she was thrilled so still happy with my purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Good for any age.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sister, she loves it. She's 24, and carries it with her everywhere.

customer_reviews.title: Today's youth cant appreciate it. ;)
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but would take a special kind of kid too appreciate in this "day in age".

customer_reviews.title: ... it as a gift for my niece and she loved it, reminds me of my
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my niece and she loved it, reminds me of my childhood

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for a child
customer_reviews.text: My little sister loves this and she is constantly getting a new pet. Pretty inexpensive and very fun for a long run

customer_reviews.title: Bite-sized Nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: This is the Tamagotchi experience of the 90s. It's simple and not time consumer like later models. Now that it's shrunk down, it's the perfect accessory for a Japanophile's keychain.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than the original but my 7 year old loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really worth it , my daughter loves it and it works perfect! Great stalking stuffer

customer_reviews.text: Love the simple nature of the care. Not to much of a distraction. And super cute!

customer_reviews.title: Just like when I was a teenager
customer_reviews.text: I had way to many of these growing up. When I saw an anniversary edition I had to have it. It brought back so many memories

customer_reviews.title: wow! when they said mini, they really meant ...
customer_reviews.text: wow! when they said mini, they really meant it! This thing is so small, i would need a magnifying glass to see the actual pet.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love mine!! It’s not the same as the old ones but that’s bc they’re specifically made for the nostalgia being the 20 ur anniversary ones. The one I received works great and is in legit packaging like the ones you’d find in stores!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my nieces and nephews for Christmas. arrived quickly with no problems at all.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was bigger but reminds me of the old days!! 😊😊😊
customer_reviews.author: audi729

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the original.
customer_reviews.text: A bunch of coworkers and I thought it'd be fun to snag some 20th Anniversary Tamagotchis and relive our childhoods. This thing really sucks. It's not clear enough in the description, but this is nothing like the original Tamagotchis. You can feed it two types of thing, clean poop, turn out the lights. That's it. No weight/age/hearts that we remembered and enjoyed. Now I have to put this dumb thing in a drawer and let it die a slow, painful death.
customer_reviews.author: J. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves taking care of her Tamagotchi just like her big brothers take care of theirs!

customer_reviews.title: 9yr old loved it
customer_reviews.text: 9yr old loved it. Brought me back to my childhood

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a mistake from the beginning. Was excited to order this for Christmas. Shipping was delayed over a month. Finally it arrived just in time for Christmas, and my daughter was excited to receive it, only to find out it DOES NOT WORK!! It won’t even turn on. I’m so frustrated.

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description at the time of ordering
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this months ago it stated it was a pack of TWO of them. Came today and only one!

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.title: Knock off.
customer_reviews.text: Was fun at first, but broke soon after. Paint rubbed off the front on the first day. Too expensive for a cheap knock off.

customer_reviews.title: It eat, sleeps, beeps, and poops. That's it.
customer_reviews.text: I orignally thought that this would be an entertaining experience, like the most recent tamogatchis. I did not think that it would simply be an annoying Keychain. The things described in the title? That is literally all it does. Nothing else. Save your money. Buy a dbrand box or something instead.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment!  Nothing like the original!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big disappointment. This thing is tiny! Not like the original at all!!!! When I purchased this, the description did not state that it is smaller than the original!

product_meta.title: Tamagotchi mini, Blue with Pink
product_meta.description: Celebrate the 20th anniversary of Tamagotchi with a smaller version of the original digital pet you love! feed it, clean up after it and just take care of it! it's that simple. includes the CR2032 battery and attaches to your bag so it goes everywhere!.
feature_bullets: Tamagotchi is celebrating its 20th anniversary with the introduction of a smaller, simpler version of the classic digital pet we all learned to love and take care of.
Included in this set is a blue with pink Tamagotchi electronic game on a chain to take with you everywhere you go!
Feed, clean up, and take care of your digital pet just like the original Tamagotchi game but this time it’s smaller with simple play!

Tamagotchi was originally designed for children 8 years or older, but these Tamagotchi toys are for also for the kid-at-heart adults looking to travel back in time to their childhood or explore Tamagotchi for the first time!
Grab your new Tamagotchi today while supplies last to help celebrate Tamagotchi's 20th Anniversary!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars184 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
